name: Main_Assembly_Handling_Process
description: Overall automated process for assembling and handling bearings (BRG), bearing housings (BH), and pallets (PLT).

name: Grasp_Bearing_BRG
description: Retrieve a bearing (BRG) from its initial position using the BRG/PLT clamp.

name: Open_BRG_PLT_Clamp
description: Open the clamp shared by bearings and pallets.

name: Close_BRG_PLT_Clamp
description: Close the clamp shared by bearings and pallets to secure an object.

name: Grasp_BearingHousing_BH
description: Retrieve a bearing housing (BH) from its initial position using the BH/Assembly clamp.

name: Open_BH_Assembly_Clamp
description: Open the clamp shared by bearing housings and assembled parts.

name: Close_BH_Assembly_Clamp
description: Close the clamp shared by bearing housings and assembled parts to secure an object.

name: Place_BH_To_RMC
description: Place the bearing housing (BH) into the Right Machining Center (RMC).

name: Place_BRG_Into_BH_For_Assembly
description: Place the bearing (BRG) into the bearing housing (BH) within the RMC for press-fit assembly.

name: Grasp_AssembledPart_From_RMC
description: Retrieve the assembled part from the Right Machining Center (RMC).

name: Place_AssembledPart_To_LMC_TemporaryStorage
description: Transfer and temporarily store the assembled part in the Left Machining Center (LMC).

name: Grasp_EmptyPallet_PLT
description: Retrieve an empty pallet (PLT) using the BRG/PLT clamp.

name: Place_EmptyPallet_To_Conveyor
description: Place the empty pallet (PLT) onto the designated station on the conveyor (CNV).

name: Grasp_AssembledPart_From_LMC
description: Retrieve the previously stored assembled part from the Left Machining Center (LMC).

name: Place_AssembledPart_On_Pallet_On_Conveyor
description: Accurately place the assembled part onto the pallet on the conveyor (CNV) to complete the cycle.
